ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night audio video CMOS security camera. NTSC signal system
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation
36 IR illuminators for night vision. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV lines. Built-in 6mm lens
Built-in audio microphone and built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Power require 12V DC 500mA or above (not include, sold separately)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Infrared Bullet Surveillance Security Camera Built-in Microphone Audio 520TVL Day Night IR-Cut Filter for Home DVR CCTV Surveillance System D03
